scripts.build-jahia: react-scripts build && find ../poc-eDocs/src/main/resources/javascript/webapp/ ! -name 'README.txt' -type f -exec rm -f {} + && cp -R build/static/js/* ../poc-eDocs/src/main/resources/javascript/webapp && find ../poc-eDocs/src/main/resources/css/webapp/ ! -name 'README.txt' -type f -exec rm -f {} + && cp -R build/static/css/* ../poc-eDocs/src/main/resources/css/webapp && rm -rf ../poc-eDocs/src/main/resources/fonts/webapp/* && cp -R build/static/media/* ../poc-eDocs/src/main/resources/fonts/webapp
